about_the_game:
Yellowstone is a single-player first-person survival horror game set in the wilderness of Yellowstone National Park, Wyoming.

You play as James Travis, a dedicated geologist on a routine field research mission. Your adventure takes a dark turn when a local park ranger reveals a newly discovered, uncharted caving system hidden deep within the park. Intrigued, you venture into the depths, only to find yourself in a labyrinth of magnificent subterranean passages that soon become terrifying.

As you delve deeper, the cave’s environment begins to shift and it starts to reveal some of its secrets. In these dark, shifting depths, you encounter ancient creatures that have lain dormant for centuries. These primordial beings are not only terrifying but also possess a connection to the cave’s evolving nature.

Your journey will test your survival skills as you navigate the cave’s intricate passages using specialized equipment, evade roaming creatures, and unravel the mysteries that lie hidden in the darkness.

Will you uncover the secrets of this ancient labyrinth and escape the terrors within, or will you become another lost soul in the depths of Yellowstone?
